name: Ather
0:
”Alexa, ask my scooter for status”
”Alexa, ask my scooter where it is”
”Alexa, ask my scooter for ETA to work”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my scooter
des:
Use this skill to get data and information about your Ather scooter in real time simply by asking your Alexa device a question.
Ather users need to set up their Ather mobile app and link their Ather account with the Alexa app to enable this functionality
Example Commands:
1. Alexa ask my scooter for range
2. Alexa ask my scooter for charge
3. Alexa ask my scooter for status
4. Alexa ask my scooter where it is
5. Alexa ask my scooter for ETA to home
6. Alexa ask my scooter ETA to work
